doc:
Bill Dillard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Dillard 0 Bill Dillard (July 20, 1911 – 1995) was an American swing music jazz trumpeter, actor and singer born in Pennsylvania, probably better known for his work with the big bands of Benny Carter, Luis Russell and Teddy Hill, among others. He also had an acting career on Broadway. Bill_Dillard ( July_20_,_1911 – 1995 ) was an_American_swing_music_jazz_trumpeter , actor_and_singer born in Pennsylvania , probably better_known for his_work with the_big_bands of Benny_Carter , Luis_Russell and Teddy_Hill , among others . He also had an_acting_career on Broadway .
